knimeNode.name: Speedy SMILES Dummy Atom Atom Class to Isotope Label
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to move dummy atom atom class labels to isotopes

intro.p: This node moves dummy atom atom classes to isotopes. Where an isotope is already present, or an (illegal!) non-numeric atom class is present, the atom is left unchanged. e.g. [*:3] is converted to [3*], but [3*:1] and [*:a] are left unchanged.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: If checked, then the input column is removed

ports.inPort: SMILES dummy atoms labelled by atom class
ports.outPort: SMILES dummy atoms labelled by isotope
